title: Add delete button with trash icon for user's own videos

requirements.text: Add a trash icon delete button to the VideoCard component that appears only when the authenticated user is the video creator, positioned prominently near other action buttons (like, comment, share)
acceptanceCriteria: Trash icon button is visible on VideoCard components for videos created by the authenticated user
Trash icon button is hidden on videos created by other users
Button is positioned consistently with other action buttons (like, comment, share)
Button uses an appropriate trash/delete icon from the existing icon library

requirements.text: Implement delete video functionality that shows a confirmation dialog when the trash icon is clicked, then calls the backend deleteVideo mutation and updates the UI optimistically
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the trash icon triggers a confirmation dialog asking the user to confirm deletion
Confirming deletion calls the backend deleteVideo mutation with the video ID
Video is removed from the feed/grid immediately after successful deletion using optimistic updates
Error handling displays appropriate toast notifications if deletion fails
Cancel option in confirmation dialog prevents deletion

requirements.text: Add the same trash icon delete button to the VideoGrid component thumbnails that appears only for the authenticated user's own videos
acceptanceCriteria: Trash icon button appears on video thumbnails in grid view for user's own videos
Button is positioned in a corner of the thumbnail (typically top-right) for easy access
Button triggers the same confirmation and deletion flow as in VideoCard
Button is hidden for videos created by other users

constraints: Delete functionality must only work for videos created by the authenticated user
Use existing backend deleteVideo function; do not modify backend logic
Maintain consistency with existing neon-inspired UI design
nonGoals: Implementing soft delete or trash/archive features
